title: Rigmar Radio Karaoke Collection 16700
description:
Thousands of hours have gone in to the renaming and tagging of the Songs in this collection to make them computer friendly so when imported into most playout software the Artist field does not contain Karaoke Label catalogue information or back to front name nonsense so searching by Artist or Song title actually returns the correct information and not karaoke label specific rubbish or nonsense.

In this regard alone this collection is unique and of course if the Karaoke labels would only drop there backwards compatibility with yesterdays physical disc technology, I would not have had to spend all those hours re naming all the tracks and then sharing them here with you so you don't have to.

300 more songs under the letter F.  The 2015 collection now features multiple label choice on the more popular songs.

ONCE AGAIN for the benefit of not just the Karaoke companies, but ALL computer users the recommended file name structure for all MUSIC FILES (Hello Karaoke is MUSIC) is

Artiste Separator Song Title [Any additional information] where the separator is space-space FOR EXAMPLE:

Kylie Minogue - I Should Be So Lucky [Studio Version]

and typed in Proper Case.  Any such file name will import correctly into all playback software and return correct search results when required.

PLEASE ONLY RUN THIS ONE DOWNLOAD AND STOP ALL OTHER TORRENTS WHEN ATTEMPTING TO DOWNLOAD THIS SERIES.  THANK YOU.
